amazingly adverb
(SURPRISINGLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 in a way that is extremely surprising: Amazingly enough, no one else has applied for the job. She had to be freed from the wreckage by firefighters, but amazingly walked away unhurt. See
amazing
More examplesFewer examplesAmazingly, he was able to walk around without being recognized. The party went on and amazingly enough there was plenty of food for everybody.Amazingly, the book took only six days to write.

(EXTREMELY)

amazing
More examplesFewer examplesThese pumpkin recipes look amazingly delicious. I think he's handled an incredibly difficult situation amazingly well.I just know that I'm going to have an amazingly fun time.
